item.viscerae.bloody_band.flavor: It feeds off the blood of the fallen
item.viscerae.crown_of_sorrows.flavor: It weeps for those you've slain
item.viscerae.depraved_poppet.flavor: Its beady eyes gleam with malice
item.viscerae.ensouled_gem.flavor: You can almost hear the soul within screaming for release
item.viscerae.gilded_foot.flavor: You feel like you'd strike it rich at a game of cards while holding it
item.viscerae.grisly_poppet.flavor: A small memento to the violence of the world
item.viscerae.jagged_crown.flavor: A crown fit for a tyrant
item.viscerae.lifeblood_of_the_pact.flav: A glistening testament to violence and depravity
item.viscerae.locket_of_youth.flavor: A small reminder of youthful glory
item.viscerae.pendant_of_memories.flavor: It remembers all of your victims... does it want to? DOes it have a choice?
item.viscerae.ring_of_souls.flavor: Souls of those you've slaughtered find themselves trapped inside
item.viscerae.rune_of_eternity.flavor: The unholy symbols of the lich lash at your mind
item.viscerae.rune_of_power.flavor: The carved symbol almost pushes you away
item.viscerae.rune_of_vitality.flavor: The engraved symbol empowers your mortal flesh
item.viscerae.talisman_of_bones.flavor: It rattles ominously, calling to those who hear it as music
enchantment.viscerae.bloodbath.desc: Unleash a wave of blood that damages and kcocks back enemies and heals the caster.
enchantment.viscerae.boil_blood.desc: Afflict all nearby enemies with the Blood Boil status effect, damaging them over time.
enchantment.viscerae.bone_cages.desc: Summon a row of bone cages that damage and snare enemies caught in them.
enchantment.viscerae.displace_flesh.desc: Teleport to a nearby standable block in the direction the caster is facing.
enchantment.viscerae.dominate_mind.desc: Completely rewire the brain of a nearby enemy into that of an ally.
enchantment.viscerae.enliven.desc: Provides significant buffs at the expense of a sizable chunk of life.
enchantment.viscerae.gore_lances.desc: Fires a stream of bloody shards in the direction cast. Has a chance to inflict Blood Boil.
enchantment.viscerae.insubstantiate.desc: Temporarily become invisible and insubstantial. Can't be targeted or damaged in this state.
enchantment.viscerae.iron_skin.desc: Temporarily increase armor and armor toughness.
enchantment.viscerae.leech_life.desc: Drain an enemies life, increasing your own.
enchantment.viscerae.marrow_shards.desc: Fire a fan of bone shards that damage and split to other enemies on kill.
enchantment.viscerae.netherite_skin.desc: Temporarily greatly increase armor and armor toughness.
enchantment.viscerae.summon_bone_storm.d: Summons a bone storm to fight alongside the caster.
enchantment.viscerae.summon_bloodlord.de: Summons a bloodlord to fight alongside the caster.
Summons a gore beetle to fight alongside the caster.
enchantment.viscerae.vampiric_bolt.desc: Fire a bolt of vampiric energy that gains the caster life on hit.
enchantment.viscerae.vampiric_slash.desc: Slash nearby enemies with dark energy and recover some health on hit.

Summon a row of bone cages that damage and snare enemies caught in them.

Infusion

Max Level: XI

Rapid weak healing spell.

Iron Skin

Max Level: XV

Temporarily increases casters armor.

Leech Life

Drain an enemies life, increasing your own.
Marrow Shards

Vampiric Bolt

Fire a bolt of vampiric energy that gains the caster life on hit.

Vampiric Slash

Max Level: XV

Slash nearby enemies with dark energy and recover some health on hit.
Launches a wave of gore lances in the direction cast
equipment.modifier.viscerae:bloodthirsty: Feed the sword with health to empower you with resistance and bloodthirst
equipment.modifier.viscerae:deadblow.des: Adds a powerful magic attack to the sword that launches the victim back
equipment.modifier.viscerae:frenzied.des: Each kill with the sword fuels higher levels of bloodlust
equipment.modifier.viscerae:gluttonous.d: Your sword repairs itself using your rations
equipment.modifier.viscerae:inner_fire.d: Attacks have a chance to inflict blood boil
equipment.modifier.viscerae:soul_bomb.de: Killing an enemy unleashes an explosion
Sacrifice some health to soul-chain all nearby enemies to the target, sharing its pain
equipment.modifier.viscerae:vampiric.des: Attacks heal you for a fraction of the damage dealt
equipment.modifier.viscerae:vital.desc: Reduce your max health in exchange for gaining absorption on kills
